page.title: 11A LEISURE AREA IN PRESTON
page.content: People wanting some form of outdoor recreation can enjoy themselves in different ways at the Deepdale leisure area between Watling St. Road and Deepdale Road. The main feature is cycling. There is a track where B.M.X. enthusiasts can race and perform stunts. Children from 7 to teenage use the track and races are organised on Sundays. The playground has three lots of swings, two roundabouts, climbing frames, a slide and a helter-skelter. Local mums bring their toddlers during the day and schoolchildren use it in the evenings. There is also a nature trail along the Eaves Brook, through Happy Valley. You can see a lot of different trees and plants and there is a variety of bird species.
